document_data.name: Sharpening of the Sword
document_data.mainbody: The '''Sharpening of the Sword''' was a religious festival observed by worshipers of [[Anhur]], the General of the Gods within the [[Mulhorandi pantheon]].
document_data.Description: The Sharpening of the Sword occurred on [[Greengrass]] and marked the end of a month-long tournament that started in [[Tarsakh]] in what the [[Mulhorandi]] referred to as the Time of Storms. This date also was used to begin campaigns if [[Mulhorand]] was at war.
